page.title: 15TONMAWR - RECREATION 2
page.content: {RUGBY FOOTBALL}is the unchallenged winter game for men and boys; Tonmawr has a rugby club with a somewhat mixed reputation - a recent cup final involving the club had to be abandoned because of fighting - although all the locals are very clear that Tonmawr's team was utterly blameless. A tour to Scotland is a bi-annual event; every other year, a scottish club comes to Tonmawr. Matches against the neighbouring club - PONTRHYDYFEN - are notoriously violent clashes. There is a specially organised section for boys (9 - 15 years old, split into teams by age) which is given a great deal of active support and training from the adult players.
